full_summary:
--------

### Government Tender Announcement

**Title**
---------------

*   **English Title:** The Repair or Overhaul or Advance Exchange of Two (2) Honeywell Flight Control Computers
*   **French Title:** La réparation ou la révision ou l’échange anticipé de deux (2) ordinateurs de contrôle de vol

**Tender Details**
-------------------

*   **Reference Number:** PW-22-01008595
*   **Amendment Number:** 1
*   **Solicitation Number:** T8493-22-0014 (1)
*   **Publication Date:** 2022-09-28
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-21T14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** 2022-10-12
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** None
*   **Tender Status:** Expiré
*   **GSIN:** *JX1680
    *   **General Category:** Miscellaneous Aircraft Accessories and Components (Military) - Repair and Overhaul
*   **UNSPSC:** None
*   **Procurement Category:** SRVTGD

**Tender Description**
----------------------

Transport Canada requires the repair or overhaul or advance exchange of two (2) Honeywell Flight Control Computers, as outlined in the Statement of Work at Annex A.

**Eligibility**
--------------

This is an open bid solicitation process. Any business that can meet the requirements outlined in the tender document is eligible to participate.

**Contracting Details**
----------------------

*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Transport Canada
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** 330 Sparks St, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0N5
*   **Contact Person:** Tanya Nadeau
*   **Contact Information:** 
    *   Phone: 343-575-6684
    *   Email: [tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca](mailto:tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca)

**Tender Documents**
----------------------

To access the tender documentation, please visit the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/28/f55df2c5e1e28b9535dbdab0b9d9571a/rfp_t8493-22-00141e.pdf](https://canadabuys
